TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class CustomErrorCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型允许访问 `error` `customErrors` section 元素集合的元素。The type allows access to the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section element collection. 它属于包含 、和的组 。It belongs to a group that includes the , , and . ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为节的 `error` 元素指定值 `customErrors` ，该部分也可以作为集合的元素来访问 。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section, which can also be accessed as elements of the collection. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为元素指定值 `error` 。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用方法后更新配置文件的结果 取决于所 选的。The result of updating the configuration file after calling the method is dependent upon the chosen. 若要更新配置文件，请使用以下两个重载之一： 和 。To update the configuration file, you use one of these two overloads: and . > [!NOTE] > 调用 相当于调用 。Calling is equivalent to calling . 如果使用 . 方法，则以下条件适用。If you use the .method, the following conditions apply. - 如果传递 或 参数值，则 `clear` 会将元素插入到 `clientTarget` 配置文件中当前层次结构级别的部分。If you pass a or parameter value, then a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. - 如果传递 参数值，则会将一系列 `remove` 元素添加到当前层次结构级别的配置文件 [ (ASP.NET Settings Schema) 的 clientTarget 元素 ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100)) 中。If you pass the parameter value, a series of `remove` elements are added to the [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100)) of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 每个都将删除对 `add` 层次结构中较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用。Each removes all references to an `add` element defined in a parent configuration file at a higher level in the hierarchy. 使用时 ，集合上还有一个附加属性，该属性会影响序列化为配置文件的内容： （默认为） `false` 。When you use , there is one additional property on the collection that affects what gets serialized to the configuration file: , which is `false` by default. 以下条件适用。The following conditions apply. - 如果 将设置为 `true` ，则 `clear` 元素将插入到 `clientTarget` 当前层次结构级别的配置文件的部分中。If the set to `true`, `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对 `add` 层次结构中较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用。This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. - 如果 标志设置为，则将 `false` `clear` 从 `clientTarget` 当前层次结构级别的配置文件的部分中删除元素（如果存在）。If the flag is set to `false`, the `clear` element is removed from the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level, if it exists. 方法实际删除 `add` 在 `clientTarget` 当前层次结构级别的配置文件的部分中定义的元素。The method actually deletes the `add` elements defined in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 它还删除对层次结构中较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的添加元素的所有引用。It also removes all references to the add elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`不会从 `clientTarget` 父配置文件的部分中删除元素。The `add` elements are not deleted from the `clientTarget` section of the parent configuration files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从集合中移除所有对象 。The following code example removes all the objects from the collection. 有关如何获取集合的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#6)]

summary.span: 从集合中移除 对象。

span.span: Removes a object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将元素插入 `remove` 到 `customErrors` 当前层次结构级别的配置文件的节中。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对 `add` 层次结构中较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素的引用。This removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`不会从父配置文件中删除这些元素。The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. `remove`元素只是将其停用。The `remove` element merely deactivates them. 但是，该 方法实际上会在当前层次结构级别上删除它们。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何删除 具有指定状态代码的对象。The following code example shows how to remove the object with the specified status code. 有关如何获取集合的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#7)]

span.span: Removes a object at the specified index location from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将元素插入 `remove` 到 `customErrors` 当前层次结构级别的配置文件的节中。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这是为了删除对 `add` 层次结构中较高级别的父配置文件中定义的元素的引用。This is to remove the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher-level in the hierarchy. **注意**`add`不会从父配置文件中删除这些元素。**Note** The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. 它们只是停用。They are merely deactivated. 但是，该 方法实际上会在当前层次结构级别上删除它们。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何移除 指定索引处的对象。The following code example shows how to remove the object at the specified index. 有关如何获取集合的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#8)]
